product_name: REI CoolMax EcoMade Low Socks - Girls'
long_description: The girls' REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade low multisport socks outfit young adventures' feet, for cycling to hiking to running. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention; the snug fit will remain, wash after wash. Mesh-knit instep panels promote airflow and help move moisture away; heels and toes are reinforced to supply increased longevity. "No feel'' seams preclude irritation and chafing along toes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The girls' REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade low multisport socks outfit young adventures' feet, for cycling to hiking to running.
